pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Wednesday, September 23, 2020 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings.

2:05 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the Speech from the Throne procession and ceremony to officially open the second session of the 43rd Parliament.

Senate of Canada
2 Rideau Street

Notes for media:

  • Pooled coverage
  • The Speech from the Throne will be broadcast live on television and online at: https://senparlvu.parl.gc.ca/Harmony/en/PowerBrowser/PowerBrowserV2/20200922/-1/9702
  • A livestream of the Speech from the Throne will be shared on social media on the following channels:
    • Twitter (@CanadianPM / @PMcanadien)
    • Facebook (Your Government at Work / Votre gouvernement à l’œuvre)
    • YouTube (Prime Minister of Canada / Premier ministre du Canada)

6:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will deliver an address to the nation. It will be broadcast live on CTV, CBC, Global, Rogers TV, LCN, and CPAC.

Office of the Prime Minister
West Block
Parliament Hill
